answers.answer: Boo.  :>(  I hope you don't have that either.  I flunked my test with my first pregnancy (I didn't fast before hand . . .  big mistake) and had to do the longer test.  It was a pain. But in the end, I didn't have gestational diabetes.  So, fast before hand and hope for the best. Bring good reading material to the appointment and hang in there.

Yeah I didn't fast for the first one either only because my doctor told me I didn't have to. Now I wish I did because I think that's why I failed. But whatever now I'm definitely fasting before this 3 hour one. And thanks! Good idea.

You'll be OK hun. Its probably nothing. When I did the one hour I failed too. I did the 3 hour test and passed. It's more of a 4hour test so prepare yourself. Take an iPad, a good book, or a friend to help you pass the time.
I had to Fast for the 1 hour one and i still failed.I passed my 3 hour test though.  It's common to fail the 1 hour and pass the 3 hour one.
I did my test last Thursday and havent heard anything yet so I'm assuming no news is good news? How long did it take for you ladies to hear back?

I have diabetes type two and i failed the one hour and did the 3 hour test and passed going for you to do the same i do not like shots so  was so relieved but the the hour test is more detailed so hopefully your pass it!! Good luck and sending good vibes your way

Thanks ladies! And I definitely will be bringing things to past the time. @reb1006, I did my test last week on Thursday and I just heard back today. If you don't hear anything before your next appointment you probably passed.

question: Just found out I failed the one hour glucose test now I have to go back for the 3 hour one. I really hope I don't have gestational diabetes.
title: Ugh not happy
